title: Youth unemployment rate in Italy 2018 , by region
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Unemployment rate in each Month on the y axis.
The Unemployment rate is highest at Month Sicily and lowest at Month Trentino-South Tyrol.
Month Sicily has 4.5 times more Unemployment rate than Month Trentino-South Tyrol which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Unemployment rate in the y axis.
The Unemployment rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Sicily and lowest at Month Trentino-South Tyrol.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Unemployment rate in each Month on the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unemployment rate for 20 number of Months.
The Unemployment rate is highest at Month Sicily and lowest at Month Trentino-South Tyrol.
Second maximum Unemployment rate is found at Month .
The highest Month Sicily has 41.7 more Unemployment rate than the lowest Month Trentino-South Tyrol.
Month Sicily is higher than any other Months with value 53.6, followed by , and Calabria. Down to Month Trentino-South Tyrol with the lowest value 11.9.
The Unemployment rate has declined over the past 20 Months.
Month Sicily, and Campania share the same value 53.6.
The highest value 53.6 at Sicily is almost 1.67 times larger than the average value 32.08.
The Unemployment rate is 641.7 if we add up values of all Months.
